edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback

Class CommentsDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback.CommentsDataSource

  • public class CommentsDataSource
extends Object
    Persistent data storage for Comment using a database defined in MySQLiteHelper. This reuses code from Android SQLite database and content provider - Tutorial by Lars Vogella.
    Author:
    ellen.spertus@gmail.com (Ellen Spertus)

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws SQLException
        Open a connection to the database, creating it if necessary. This should be called before any of the other methods. When the connection is no longer needed, close() should be called.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database could not be opened.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the connection to the database, opened with open().

      • createComment

        Comment createComment(int recipient,
                    String content)
        Create a comment with the specified content for the specified recipient. This both adds the comment to the database and constructs a Comment instance.
        Parameters:
        recipient - the index within Person.everyone of the recipient
        content - the content of the comment
        Returns:
        a new Comment instance

      • getAllComments

        List<Comment> getAllComments()
        Retrieve all comments from the database.
        Returns:
        all comments in the database
